item.title: Intellectual Property Foundation and Patent Mining
item.description: Introduction Scope of Intellectual Property Intellectual property Also known as “intellectual property rights”, it refers to the broad fields of industry, technology, science and art The exclusive legal rights involved in intellectual creation, invention and innovation. Intellectual property rights include: Copyright (copyright), trademark, patent, Trade secrets, new plant varieties, semiconductor integrated circuit design, trade name (company name) Patent Type Total have three type of patent Invention New technical solutions for products, methods or their combination.
